common.noMatches: Ga go na tse di tshwanang

profile.title: Profailo ya Modirisi
profile.mustLogin: O tshwanetse go tsena go bona dipeakanyo.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontsha molaetsa wa konokono le phetolelo
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Bontsha konokono fa thoko le phetolelo
profile.filterExplicit: Sefa dikateng tse di sa tshwaneng
profile.allowExplicitContent: Letla dikateng tse di sa tshwaneng
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sekono go fitlha go phimolwa ka bo yona
profile.saveError: Phoso: Ga di a kgona go bolokwa
profile.noPrivateKey: Ga go na senotlelo sa poraefete mo sedirisweng seno go romelwa.
profile.backupDownloaded: Bekapo e e pateletsweng e kopolotswe.
profile.importSuccess: Senotlelo sa poraefete se tsentswe mo sedirisweng seno.
profile.importFailed: Go tsenya senotlelo go retetse (khunololamoraba e phoso kgotsa faele e senyegile).
profile.keysRotated: Pheto ya senotlelo e ncha e dirilwe mme senotlelo sa phatlalatsa sa rometswe.
profile.importKey: Tsenya bekapo e e pateletsweng ya senotlelo
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlelo sa gago sa poraefete ga se tswele mo sedirisweng seno. Romela kopi e e nang le khunololamoraba go kgona go se busetsa mo sedirisweng se sengwe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O mo go Free—dirisa dikgetho tsa Letsatsi/Mmogo fa tlase. Ntšhafatsa go bula ditema tse dintsi.
profile.backupTitle: Dibekapo tse di Pateletsweng & Tshwaragano ya Didirisiwa
profile.backupDesc: Dira dibekapo tse di nang le khunololamoraba tsa dinotlolo, mme o di busetse mo sedirisweng se sengwe go dira tshwaragano.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Phifola fa app e sa ntse e se mo tirisong
profile.notifyOnCopy: Nkitse fa molaetsa wa me o kopiwa
profile.unfollowFailed: Go retetse go tlogela go sala morago
profile.followHint: Dipalopalo tsa bone di tla bonala mo fiding ya O a Ba Sala Morago fa ba bega ka “Batsalabamorago” kgotsa “Phatlalatsa”.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Go na le se sengwe se sa siamang mo karolong eno.
profile.forwarding: Go Fetisetsa Meletsa le Meitsa ya Founo
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Go Fetisetsa Meitsa le kgotsa Meletsa
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa meitsa le melaetsa e tsenang kwa mo founong kgotsa imeleng e e netefaditsweng. Meitsa/melaetsa e e tswang e ka bontsha nomoro ya gago ya Chatforia.
profile.forwardSaved: Dipeakanyo tsa go fetisetsa di bolokilwe
profile.errE164: Tsenya nomoro ya founo ya E.164 e e siameng (mohl. +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Tlhopha bonnye bo le bongwe (founo kgotsa imeile).
profile.errQuietHours: Diura tsa boitseanape di tshwanetse go nna magareng ga 0 le 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Tlhopha sengwe sa mafoko kgotsa phaposi ya puisano go simolola go bua

status.captionPlaceholder: Abelana ka se o se akanyang...
status.filesNote: Go fitlha faele tse 5. Ka tlwaelo di fela ka diura 24.

sidebar.empty: Ga gona dipuisano go se kae.

premium.heading: Ntshefatsa go Premium
premium.description: Bula ditshebeletso tse di maatla & tlose ditshaetsi.

auth.headline: Melaetsa e e sireletsegileng ya lefatshe ka bophara ka phetolelo e potlako
auth.description: Pateletso ya bokhutlo go ya bokhutlong, phetolelo e e tsamaiswang ke AI, melaetsa e e nyelelang, le mehala ya lentswe/vidio.

feature.encryption: Pateletso ya bokhutlo go ya bokhutlong ka tlwaelo
feature.translation: Ranola dipuo di feta 100 ka bo yona
feature.disappearing: Melaetsa e e nyelelang & ditebego tsa go buisiwa
feature.privacy: Poraefete pele. Datha ya gago, taolo ya gago.
feature.translate: Phetolelo ya ka nako ya nnete
feature.privacyAlt: Moralo o o tsayang poraefete pele

auth.desktopTip: O mo khomphuteng? Skene ka founo go tsaya app.

headlineAlt.main: Mosebeletsi wa melaetsa yo o sireletsegileng yo

auth.subhead: Melaetsa e poraefete, e pateletsweng, e ranotsweng — ka ponyo ya leitlho.
auth.tip: O ka dirisa Chatforia mo sesebedisi sengwe le sengwe — kgotsa o tle o kopolle app go nna le maitemogelo a matle.
auth.scanHint: Skene go kopolla app kgotsa go e bula mo sebrowsereng.

press.title: Batlhabanni ba Ditaba
press.contact: Go dipotso tsa boralitaba, re kwaleleng kwa press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Go dipotso tsa boralitaba, re kwaleleng kwa press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ke mosebeletsi wa melaetsa o o sireletsegileng o nang le phetolelo e potlako le pateletso ya bokhutlo go ya bokhutlong, o dira puisano ya lefatshe ka bophara e nna motlhofo le e poraefete.
press.assetsText: Dilo tsa logo, diphufutso le ditshwantsho tsa sehlahisoa (di tlaa tla).

careers.title: Ditiro
careers.intro: Re setlhopha se sennye se se agilweng molaetsa o poraefete, wa lefatshe ka bophara. Fa o tlhokomela pateletso, go fitlhelela, le UX e e itumedisang, re rata go go utlwa.
careers.openRoles: Ditiro tse di bulegileng: Enjiniaring (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahisoa, Tshegetso.
careers.apply: Tsela ya go dira kopo: Romela CV/dikgokagano kwa jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ka ga Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke mosebeletsi wa melaetsa o o sireletsegileng, o buang dipuo di le dintsi ka pateletso ya bokhutlo go ya bokhutlong, phetolelo e potlako, le mehala ya lentswe/vidio. Maikaelelo a rona a motlhofo: go thusa batho go ikgolaganya—ka polokego, ka poraefete, le mo dipuong tsotlhe.

values.privacy: Poraefete pele: Pateletso ya E2E ka tlwaelo.
values.access: Go fitlhelela go botlhe: Phetolelo ka bo yona ya dipuo di feta 100.
values.control: Taolo: Melaetsa e e nyelelang & ditebego tsa go buisiwa ke boithaopo.

about.howDescription: Melaetsa e a patelelwa mo sedirisweng sa gago pele e tswa. Phetolelo, dibekapo, le tshwaragano ya didirisiwa di rulagantswe go fokotsa se diserafa tsa rona di ka se bonang.

advertise.title: Tsegetsa ka Chatforia
advertise.description: Fitlha basebelisi ba melaetsa ba ba amegileng ka ditema tse di matsetseleko, tse di babalesegileng mo letsholong. Re na le dipharologanyo tsa diaparo tsa banner, botsheledi, le dipapatso tsa ntlha. Ba Premium ga ba bone ditshaetsi.

adsense.withPubId: Gompieno re dirisa Google AdSense. Fa o batla go re lebanya ka Google Ads, dirisa ID ya phepafatso {{pubId}} mme o kope managed placement mo diyuniting tse di fa tlase. Tshegetso ka kotloloho e a tlhokega—dirisa foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Gompieno re dirisa Google AdSense. Tshegetso ka kotloloho le yone e teng—dirisa foromo fa tlase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ga go ise go rulaganywe mafelo a dipapatso. A tlhatlhobolwe mo ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Go tsena gantsi le go nna lobaka lo loleele mo UI ya puisano
why.brandSafe: Dikao tse di sireletsegileng; go kgaola gararo ga dipapatso
why.sponsoredMoments: Dinatla tse di tshegetsweng (mohl., “Simolola Puisano” modal) di teng
why.deals: Ditumelano ka kotloloho kgotsa ka lenaneo ka AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Re leboga! Potso ya gago e tshotlhe. Re tla latela ka bonako.
form.successToast: Re leboga! Re tla ikgolaganya le wena ka bonako.
form.mailtoInfo: Re bula sesebelisoa sa imeile sa gago go romela potso…
form.messageLabel: Re bolelele ka phutego ya gago
form.messagePlaceholder: Go lebanya, malatsi, KPI, dikgetho tsa mafelo…

legal.disclaimerStart: Ka go romela, o dumalana le

upgrade.title: Ntshefatsa
upgrade.subtitle: Bula leano le le go tshwanetseng: tlosang ditshaetsi ka Plus, kgotsa tsaya tshebeletso e e feletseng ka Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Senope sa peeletso se tla fela
scheduleBanner.body: O tla boela mo go Free ka

features.save25: Boloka ~25% ga e bapisiwa le kgwedi
features.sameFeatures: Dikarolo tse di tshwanang le Kgwedi

gettingStarted.title: Go Simolola
gettingStarted.subtitle: O mosha mo Chatforia? Tataiso eno e e khutshwane e bontsha tsotlhe tsa botlhokwa gore o nne le tlhagafalo ka bonako.

alert.text: Tataiso eno e tla gola fa re tsenya dikarolo tse disha. Fa go na le sengwe se se tlhokang, re itsise ka

section1.title: 1) Dira akhaonte ya gago
section1.loginText: ka akhaonte ya gago e e teng.

section2.title: 2) Simolola go romelana melaetsa
section2.item1: Dira DM kgotsa Sethopha mme o romele molaetsa wa ntlha.
section2.item2: Dirisa phetolelo ya ka bonako go buisana mo dipuong di feta 100.
section2.item3: Leka melaetsa e e nyelelang le ditebego mo Profailo → Poraefete.

section3.title: 3) Tswelela pele
section3.item1Part2: tsebe (Plus = ga go ditshaetsi, Premium = dikarolo tsotlhe).
section3.item2Part1: Golaganya didirisiwa tse dingwe mme o rulaganye dibekapo tse di pateletsweng mo

account.q: Ke dira jang kgotsa ke busetsa jang akhaonte ya me?
account.a: Kopolla app kgotsa dirisa web, tobetsa “Dira akhaonte”, netefatsa imeile/founo. Go busetsa, dirisa “O lebetse khunololamoraba”.

privacy.q: A melaetsa e pateletswe bokhutlo go ya bokhutlong?
privacy.a: Ee. Melaetsa le mehala di pateletswe ka tlwaelo. Ke wena le moamogedi fela ba ka e buang.

translate.q: Phetolelo ya ka bonako e dira jang?
translate.a: Bulela “Ranola ka bo yone” mo Dipeakanyo → Ponalo & Puo. Re ranola mo sedirisweng fa go kgonega, kgotsa ka di-API tse di sireletsegileng ka metadata e nnye.

contact.a: Re kwaleleng kwa support@chatforia.com. Akaretsa ditshwantsho le mofuta wa app.

contact.title: Ikgolaganye le Rona
contact.successMsg: Re leboga—setlhopha sa rona se tla araba ka imeile.
contact.errorSend: Ga e a kgona go romela. Tsweetswee kwalela support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Leano leno la Poraefete le tlhalosa gore Chatforia (“rona”, “re”) re kokoanya, re dirisa, le go abelana ka tshedimosetso fa o dirisa diarogi tsa rona le ditirelo. Re rulaganya Chatforia go fokotsa datha e re ka e bonang.

infoWeCollect.title: Tshedimosetso e re e kokoanyang
infoWeCollect.account: Tshedimosetso ya akhaonte (mohl., imeile/founo) go dira le go sireletsa akhaonte ya gago.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Dikgathego tse di pateletsweng (melaetsa/mehala) di pateletswe E2E; ga re kgone go di bala.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Dintlha tsa go popota/tshebediso jaaka di-log tsa go thubega, mofuta wa sedirisiwa, kgotsa terompeta e khutshwane go tokafatsa tiragatso.

howWeUse.title: Re dirisa tshedimosetso jang
howWeUse.provide: Go fana le go sireletsa tirelo (tsenyo, go lemoga spam/tsenyo).
howWeUse.improve: Go tokafatsa dikarolo (boleng jwa phetolelo, boitshepegi).

sharing.title: Go abelana
sharing.body: Ga re reke datha ya botho. Re ka abelana datha e nnye le ba dirang tiro (mohl., push, tekolo) ka ditumalano tse di thata.

rights.title: Ditshwanelo tsa gago
rights.body: Go ikaegile ka lefelo la gago (mohl., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), o ka kopa go tsena, go tokafatsa, go phimola, kgotsa go ikgogela kwa thoko mo ditsamaisong dingwe. Ikgolaganye: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Polokelo ya datha & tshireletso
retention.body: Re boloka fela se se tlhokegang go dira tirelo mme re dirisa tshireletso ya maemo a indasteri. Dikonokono tsa E2E ga di kgone go tlhakangwa ke rona.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ga e reretswe bana ba ba kwa tlase ga dingwaga tse 13 (kgotsa jaaka molao wa lona o batla).

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re tlaa bea dintšhafatso fano mme re ntšhafatse letsatsi la “La ntšhafadiwa la bofelo”.

intro.body: Ka go dirisa Chatforia o dumalana le Melao eno. Fa o sa dumele, o se ka wa dirisa tirelo.

accounts.title: Diakhaonte
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Neela tshedimosetso e e maleba mme o boloke di-kopi tsa gago di sireletsegile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: O tsaya boikarabelo jwa tiriso ya akhaonte ya gago.

acceptableUse.title: Tiriso e e dumalanwang
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Se romele dikateng tse di seng molaong, tse di tshosang kgotsa tse di senyang ditokelo; ga go spam kgotsa tiriso e e ikatisitsweng e e bosula.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emisa/khutlisa tiriso fa go na le go tlola.

yourContent.title: Dikgathego tsa gago
yourContent.body: O boloka ditokelo mo dikgathegong tsa gago. O re naya ditokelo tse di tlhokegang go dira tirelo (mohl., go tsamaisa, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Dikitsiso & maikarabelo
disclaimer.body: Tirelo e fiwa “jaaka e le yone” ntle le dikitso. Go ya ka molao, Chatforia ga e na maikarabelo mo tšenyo e e sa tlhamalalang kgotsa e e latelang.

changes.title: Diphetogo
changes.body: Re ka ntšhafatsa melao eno; go tswelela ka tiriso morago ga diphetogo go raya go dumalana.

doNotSell.title: Se Rekise kgotsa go Abelana Tshedimosetso ya Me
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ga e reke tshedimosetso ya botho. Le fa go le jalo, baagi ba California ba ka tsenya dikopo go ya ka CPRA ka konopo e e kwa tlase.

cookies.title: Dipeakanyo tsa Dikuki
cookies.body: Chatforia e dirisa dikuki tse di nnye (mohl., sedulo, tshireletso). Ga re dirise dikuki tsa ditshaetsi tsa boraro. Laola dikuki mo dipeakanyong tsa sebrowsera sa gago.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ga e kgone go laisa maemo a nomoro ya founo.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ga go a abelwa nomoro. Tlhopha ka koutu ya kgaolo go simolola go romela melaetsa.

startChatModal.title: Simolola puisano
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Kwala leina, leina la modirisi, founo, kgotsa imeile…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Simolola puisano le ba ba tlhophilweng
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Batla ka leina la modirisi kgotsa founo
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Kwala leina la modirisi kgotsa founo mme o tobetse Batla.
startChatModal.pickFromContacts: Kgotsa tlhopha go tswa mo dikgokaganong
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Dingwalo tsa founo/imeile di tla nna teng fa o di boloka e le dikgokagano.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Go retetse go simolola puisano le ba ba tlhophilweng.

sounds.freeNotice: O mo Free — medumo ya premium e a bontshiwa mme e thibile. Ntshefatsa go bula tsotlhe.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Karolo eno e tlhokana le leano la Premium.

aiSettings.title: Dipeakanyo tsa AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Laola phetolelo, dikarabo tse di botlhale, le ForiaBot ya dikarabo ka bo yona.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Ranola melaetsa e e tsenang ka bo yona
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Bontsha konokono fa thoko le phetolelo
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Romela melaetsa e mmalwa ya bofelo (e tlhatswitsweng) go AI go akantsha dikarabo tse di potlakileng.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Pusha mafoko a bosenyi mo dikakantsong tsa AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Fa e le teng, dikakantso tse di boang ke AI di tla patelwa mafoko a a swailweng
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Bulela karabo ka bo yona fa ke sa tlhole ke gona
aiSettings.autoReplyMode: Mokgwa wa karabo ka bo yona
aiSettings.saveFailed: Go retetse go boloka dipeakanyo tsa AI
aiSettings.translateAll: Ranola melaetsa yotlhe e e tsenang

accessibilitySettings.title: Go a Fitlhelela & Dikitsiso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Dikgetho tsa go dira Chatforia gore e nne motlhofo go dirisiwa o sa ikaega ka modumo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: E simolola ka bogolo jo bo tlwaelegileng. Oketsa fa o rata mafoko a magolo mo dipeakanyong tsa go fitlhelela.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Dikitsiso tsa pono tsa melaetsa & mehala
Bontsha dibanekere le go phatsima ga setlhogo gore o se ke wa fetelelwa ke tiro.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Roroma fa go na le melaetsa e mesha (fa go tshegeditswe)
Bula go roroma ga sedirisiwa ka dikitsiso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Phatsima skrini fa go tsena mehala
Phatsima ka nakwana fa mehala e lela.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Ranola dintlha tsa lentswe ka bo yona
Tlamela sengwalwa mo melaetseng ya audio e o e amogelang.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Dikitsiso tsa pono tsa melaetsa & mehala
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Bontsha dibanekere le go phatsima ga setlhogo gore o se ke wa fetelwa.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Roroma ka melaetsa e mesha (fa go tshegeditswe)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Tlhotlheletsa go roroma ga sedirisiwa ka dikitsiso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Phatsima skrini fa mehala e tsena
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Phatsima ka nakwana fa mehala e lela.

privacySection.strictE2EE: Pateletso e e tiileng ya bokhutlo go ya bokhutlong
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Boloka fela sengwalwa se se pateletsweng mo serafeng. E thiba AI/Phetolelo le ponelopele ya taolo.

linkedDevicesPanel.title: Didirisiwa tse di Golagantsweng
linkedDevicesPanel.noneFound: Ga gona didirisiwa tse di golagantsweng.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Batla ka leina la boitseanape, leina, leina la modirisi, kgotsa founo
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Ditsela di se kae tsa bonako go simolola.
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Batla ka founo / leina la modirisi
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Abelana kgokagano ya go mema go simolola puisano ka ponyo ya leitlho.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Nna o ikgolagantse mo tseleng ka Chatforia ya iOS le Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Kakanyo: Melaetsa ya gago e dula e tshwaragane mo web le mo mobile.

randomChat.title: Puisano ka Go Iketla
randomChat.description: Ithutane le motho yo mosha ka ponyo ya leitlho. Re tla lo tshwanelanya mme re bule phaposi ya nakwana.
randomChat.saveGuard: Ke dipuisano tsa motho-go-motho fela tse di ka bolokwang
